FuncDef: This command saves existing debug configuration (configuration done under the debug branch of CLI). Debug configurations are not saved by theadmin savecommand and not preserved across a node reboot or CPM switchover. Thedebug-savecommand makes the debug configuration available for the operator to execute after a reboot by using theexeccommand or after a CPM switchover by using theswitchover-execcommand, if desired.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the file URL location to save the debug configuration. If no file-url is specified then the debug configuration is saved at the same location as the standard configuration file (bof>primary-config/bof>secondary-config/bof>tertiary-config) with the same file name as the standard configuration file but with a .dbg suffix. Values-file url|local-url | remote-url: 255 chars max, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id file-path 199 chars max, , remote-url |[{ftp:// | tftp://}login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |255 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |{hostname | ipv4-address | [ipv6-address]}, ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses 255 , cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
